questions.question: Which song famously began with the lyrics 'Just a small town girl, living in a lonely world' in the 1980s?
incorrectAnswers: Living on a Prayer by Bon Jovi
Sweet Child o' Mine by Guns N' Roses
Girls Just Want to Have Fun by Cyndi Lauper

questions.question: Who won the Grammy Award for Album of the Year in 1977 for the album 'Songs in the Key of Life'?
Which group is credited with popularizing rap music in the 1980s with their hit 'Walk This Way'?
What was the name of Britney Spears' debut single that became a global hit in 1998?
Which band released the influential alternative rock album 'Hybrid Theory' in the year 2000?
Which song became synonymous with disco fever in the late 1970s?
Which artist famously moonwalked across the stage during a performance of 'Billie Jean' in the 1980s?
What was the name of Nirvana's groundbreaking album in 1991 that became a symbol of the grunge movement?
Which 1990s group was known for their hit song 'Wannabe', catapulting them to global fame?
Which song, released in 2000, became an anthem for a new generation and won a Grammy for Record of the Year?
incorrectAnswers: Oops!... I Did It Again - Britney Spears

questions.question: Which song by Queen became a global anthem and is known for its distinctive music video in the 1970s?
What was the name of Madonna's first UK number one single in the 1980s?
Who won the Grammy for Best New Artist in 2000?
What was the name of the iPod's first competitor, released by Creative Labs in 2000?
Which hip-hop group released 'Straight Outta Compton' in 1988?
